references: Repealing: Ord 70150, 90007, 90726, 103609. Amending: Ord 15956. Related: Res 25355, CF 277116.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to noise control; providing for administration and enforcement, defining offenses, prescribing penalties, and repealing Ordinances 90007, 90726, 103609, 70150 and Section 1 1/2 of Ordinance 15956.
